title: Viral AI-Generated Movie Becomes First to Gross $100 Million at Box Office
introText: An entirely AI-generated feature film has shattered box office records, sparking intense debate about the future of Hollywood. The film, created with minimal human intervention, has Hollywood unions calling for new regulations.

content.content: 'Synthetic Dreams' has grossed $100 million worldwide, becoming the first AI-generated film to achieve mainstream success. The sci-fi thriller was created using AI tools for script, visuals, and voice synthesis.
Hollywood unions are alarmed by the implications. SAG-AFTRA and the Writers Guild are calling for regulations requiring human creative involvement and disclosure of AI use in productions.

Audience reviews are mixed: some praise the innovative storytelling, while others find the AI-generated performances unsettling. The debate highlights tensions between technological possibility and artistic authenticity.
